verses.name: Acts 27:35
verses.text: And when he had thus spoken, he took bread, and gave thanks to God in presence of them all: and when he had broken it, he began to eat.

verses.name: Acts 27:36
verses.text: Then were they all of good cheer, and they also took some meat.

verses.name: Acts 27:37
verses.text: And we were in all in the ship two hundred threescore and sixteen souls.

verses.name: Acts 27:38
verses.text: And when they had eaten enough, they lightened the ship, and cast out the wheat into the sea.
